DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine difference oxygenation decarboxylation two weaning process .
DOC.brief_title: PEEP Influence Gas Exchange During Early Weaning
DOC.detailed_description: First , control mechanical ventilation patient ventilate 5 minute 100 % oxygen . After 5 minute PaO2/FiO2 calculate compare PaO2/FiO2 ventilation FiO2 - 30 % . The patient divide two section : Section A patient le 24 hour mechanical ventilation wean start . Section B patient 24 hour wean start . The patient every section divide two group . Group 1 wean start PEEP equal P mean BiPAP , Group 2 wean start PEEP equal PEEP BiPAP . Further , wean conduct known algorithm . The difference oxygenation decarboxylation measure 30 120 Minutes Group A 30 , 120 , 240 , 360 Minutes Group B .
DOC.criteria: All Patients mechanical ventilate intensive care unit . Patients 18 year age Patients study last 30 day Patients enrolled study Pregnant woman Nursing mother Existing severe Lung disease Existing COPD Gold IV
